data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Las Tunas, Cuba.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Las Tunas, Cuba
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 60,758 believers in Las Tunas to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, if there is even one of the 60,758 believers in Las Tunas, Cuba who does not have a Bible, please provide them one today.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Las Tunas, Cuba and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Las Tunas
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Las Tunas, Las Tunas, Cuba.
Lord, let it be said of the 475,242 lost in Las Tunas that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Las Tunas an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Las Tunas, Cuba. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Las Tunas
location.cities_list: Las Tunas, Puerto Padre, Jesús Menéndez, Jobabo, Amancio
